Of the government of churches; a discourse pointing at the primitive form. Thorndike, Herbert, 1598-1672.
[8], 208 p.
Printed by Roger Daniel, printer to the Universitie of Cambridge, [Cambridge] : 1641.
Dedication signed: Herbert Thorndike. Place of publication from Wing. Annotation on Thomason copy: "by Herbert Thorndirk". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
